mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recipe(user_id, name, description, cook_time, meal_type, steps, total_calories, total_protein, total_fat, total_carbs) VALUES(#{userId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{cookTime}, #{mealType}, #{steps}, #{totalCalories}, #{totalProtein}, #{totalFat}, #{totalCarbs})

(#{item.recipeId}, #{item.foodId}, #{item.weight})
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, name, description, cook_time, meal_type, steps, total_calories, total_protein, total_carbs, total_fat FROM recipe WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE recipe SET name = #{name}, user_id = #{userId}, description = #{description}, cook_time = #{cookTime}, meal_type = #{mealType}, steps = #{steps}, total_calories = #{totalCalories}, total_protein = #{totalProtein}, total_fat = #{totalFat}, total_carbs = #{totalCarbs}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE recipe SET like_count = like_count - 1 WHERE id = #{recipeId} AND like_count > 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recipe_favorite(recipe_id, user_id, created_at) VALUES(#{recipeId}, #{userId}, NOW())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM recipe_favorite WHERE recipe_id = #{recipeId} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE recipe SET favorite_count = favorite_count - 1 WHERE id = #{recipeId} AND favorite_count > 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recipe_comment (recipe_id, user_id, content, create_time) VALUES (#{recipeId}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id, recipe_id AS recipeId, user_id AS userId, content, create_time AS createTime FROM recipe_comment WHERE recipe_id = #{recipeId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
